title: Plat Supp 61% win rate looking for ADC
body:
Platt Supp player with 61% win rate
Main; Janna, Alistar, Raka

Looking for a decent adc to climb to diamond with, have lost too many games recently with terrible adc's.

Add me in game

replies.body: Do you play any supports that aren't terrible?

Hey mate I'm a plat 5 ADC main, was plat 3 last season. I main Jinx. 
I only play 1-2 ranked games a night at around 9pm Brisbane time. Let me know if this suits you.
